comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Douglas B-23 Dragon 39-036 (c/n 2722) redesignated UC-67 Jul 23, 1944. An exhaustive history and more photos an be found here. J. Baugher's listing for this aircraft reads: "...To RFC at Bush Field Sep 8, 1944. To Paul Mantz Air Services as NC52327 in 1945. To California Oil Co as N52327 in 1947. To Westernair in 1970, Data Flight, Inc in 1971, Spurling Aviation, Ltd in 1977, to Puget Sound Helicopters Jan 1981, Univ of WA Nov 1982. To McChord Air Museum, WA Dec 11, 1985, where it is now on display. Damaged in landing at Kingman, AZ Jun 1984. Restored to military configuration at Mojave in 1985 and ownership passed to USAFM..." Click here for another small photo taken at Long Beach Municipal in 1961.
